typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Matching value LMDB} as string,
		{Matching value LMDB II} as string,
		{Site Ship To (char)} as string,
		Date as string,
		{Transaction Time} as string,
		{Transaction ID} as string,
		{Card Number} as string,
		{Transaction Value} as string,
		{Transaction Quantity} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		{Matching value LMDB},
		{Matching value LMDB II},
		{Site Ship To (char)},
		Date,
		{Transaction Time},
		{Transaction ID},
		{Card Number},
		{Transaction Value},
		{Transaction Quantity}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink() ~> sink1
